title: The Dark Side of Midnight
description: Sheriff’s Captain Justine Erica Trent—known to her colleagues as Jet—tosses her hat into the ring for the job of Sheriff of Paradise County. Loyal, honest, and straight as an arrow, Jet is surprised when her mentor and the current sheriff resorts to underhanded tactics to win the runoff for the coveted position.When gorgeous high school principal Autry Bishop reports that her husband Frank Bishop, the presiding judge over the Texas Court of Criminal Appeals is receiving death threats, Jet is exposed to the cruel, criminal underbelly of dirty politics. She struggles to keep Judge Bishop out of harm’s way and keep Autry Bishop out of her heart.Bestselling Lesbian action/adventure author Erin Wade brings the twists and turns she is known for to this story of deceit and murder in a quiet college town on the banks of the Brazos River deep in the Heart of Texas.
author: Erin Wade
